/*****************************************************************


				Sensor Description

Sensor map in Ec unit 

0 1 2 
3 4 5
6 7 8


Simgle Ec unit map in Board and Asic

The first number is the Board, the second is the Asic

(b,a)  ,  (b,a+1)
(b+1,a),  (b+1,a+1)

0<=b,a <5 


an element (b,a) is an 8x8 sub-matrix

1 is a dead pixel 0 is alive



*******************************************************************/ 

^ /*you nead the symbol '^' to strart and end the matrix
